name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondents v. Timothy KRUTH, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondents v. Timothy KRUTH, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of January, 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, and the case is remanded to the Commonwealth Court for consideration of this Court’s decision in McKinley v. Commonwealth, Dept. of Transp., Bureau of Driver Licensing, 576 Pa. 85, 838 A.2d 700, 2003 WL 22971264, (Pa.2003).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
841 A.2d 120
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondents v. Timothy KRUTH, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 22, 2004.
